Title: Kosmo Florence King Size Bed with Storage in Vermount Finish

Details.Dimensions:: H 36.4 x W 79.4 x D 82.4; Seating Height-13.1

Description: Kosmo furniture offers a wide range of furniture that is strong, durable and tough. It comes from the house of Spacewood, which is Indias largest furniture manufacturer. These products are made from melamine and membrane finish technology with an Iso: 9001, 18001, 14001 approved quality standards. All our products go through stringent quality checks to provide you the best of best at the most durable prices. Contemporary is very current and in trend, of the here and now. Its a very fluid, simplistic style which takes its cues from the in-vogue polishes, textures and colors of the season and is bereft of any ornamentation or embellishments.
